      • start

        public static void start(int port,
                         int timerWaiting,
                         int timerTurn)
        Start the RMI sever
        Parameters:
        port - Server's port used by client to connect
        timerWaiting - Duration of the timer during the login phase
        timerTurn - Duration of the timer for a single turn

             throws java.rmi.RemoteException

        Parameters:
